statements: SELECT * FROM government_contracts
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM government_contracts ORDER BY contractor_name DESC
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT contract_id, contract_amount FROM government_contracts ORDER BY contract_amount
SELECT * FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000 ORDER BY contract_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY contractor_name ASC
SELECT AVG(contract_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM government_contracts
SELECT contractor_name, SUM(contract_amount) AS total_amount FROM government_contracts GROUP BY contractor_name HAVING total_amount > 50000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY contract_amount DESC, contract_date ASC
SELECT * FROM government_contracts;
SELECT contract_title, vendor_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_contracts;
SELECT contract_title, contract_amount FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000;
SELECT vendor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT contract_title, amount_spent FROM government_contracts JOIN procurement_records ON government_contracts.contract_id = procurement_records.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM government_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_title, vendor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 100000;
SELECT vendor_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_title, vendor_name, SUM(contract_amount) AS total_amount FROM government_contracts GROUP BY contract_title, vendor_name;
SELECT pc.record_date, pc.description, gc.contract_title FROM procurement_records pc JOIN government_contracts gc ON pc.contract_id = gc.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM GovernmentContracts
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM GovernmentContracts ORDER BY contract_amount DESC
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM GovernmentAgencies WHERE LENGTH(agency_name) > 10
SELECT * FROM ProcurementRecords WHERE procurement_amount > 10000 ORDER BY procurement_date ASC

SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM ProcurementRecords JOIN GovernmentAgencies ON ProcurementRecords.agency_id = GovernmentAgencies.agency_id GROUP BY agency_name HAVING total_contracts > 1
SELECT * FROM GovernmentContracts;
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM GovernmentContracts ORDER BY signing_date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, procurement_amount FROM GovernmentAgencies JOIN ProcurementRecords ON GovernmentAgencies.agency_id = ProcurementRecords.agency_id WHERE procurement_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM GovernmentContracts WHERE contractor_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(contract_amount) FROM GovernmentContracts;
SELECT * FROM contractors;
SELECT contractor_name, headquarters_address FROM contractors ORDER BY contractor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000;
SELECT contractor_name, contact_email FROM contractors WHERE contractor_name LIKE '%LLC%';
SELECT contract_number, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT c.contractor_name, ch.action_taken FROM contractors c INNER JOIN contracts_history ch ON c.contractor_id = ch.contract_id WHERE ch.action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_address LIKE '%Washington%' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_contracts, AVG(contract_amount) AS avg_amount FROM contracts;
SELECT * FROM government_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contractor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts ORDER BY contract_amount DESC;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts WHERE contractor_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT contract_name, contract_amount, contractor_name, start_date, end_date FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM government_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contractor_name, contract_amount FROM government_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM government_contracts WHERE contract_amount > 100000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM contract_employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT document_type, document_name, file_path FROM contract_documents WHERE contract_id = 3;
